emails.subject: Laboratory Report Request
emails.fullText:
Hi Justin,

I'm sending the laboratory report for the Oakdale site as requested. Please review the attached documents and let me know if you need any additional analysis.

Attachments:
Laboratory Report for Lab Request No ISO16-04-08 Oakdale Disposal Site August 2016 MCES Final.pdf (1.2 MB); Data Tables Supplementary.xlsx (850 kB); Chain of Custody Forms.pdf (450 kB)

Best regards,
Sarah Bailey
3M Environmental Laboratory

emails.subject: RE: Laboratory Report Request
emails.fullText:
Sarah,

Thank you for the comprehensive laboratory report. I've reviewed the data and have a few questions about the methodology used for PFOA detection. I'm attaching our internal review comments and some comparative data from similar sites.

Attachments:
Internal Review Comments on Oakdale Report.docx (125 kB); Comparative Site Data Analysis.xlsx (780 kB)

Could we schedule a call to discuss these findings?

Best,
Justin Pettinelli
Environmental Testing Lab

emails.subject: RE: Laboratory Report Request - Meeting Scheduled
emails.fullText:
Justin and Sarah,

I've scheduled a conference call for Thursday at 2 PM EST to discuss the laboratory findings. I'll send calendar invites shortly.

Regards,
Allan Carasco
3M Project Manager

emails.subject: Q3 Budget Update - Environmental Projects
emails.fullText:
Finance Team,

Please find attached the updated Q3 budget projections for all environmental monitoring projects. The attached spreadsheets include detailed breakdowns by project, vendor costs, and timeline adjustments.

Attachments:
Q3 Environmental Projects Budget Summary.xlsx (2.1 MB); Detailed Project Costs Breakdown.xlsx (1.8 MB); Vendor Contracts Summary.pdf (980 kB); Timeline and Milestone Updates.docx (445 kB)

Let me know if you need any clarifications before our budget review meeting.

Best,
Bjorn Gangeness
3M Environmental Division

emails.subject: RE: Q3 Budget Update - Environmental Projects
emails.fullText:
Bjorn,

Thank you for the detailed budget update. The finance team has reviewed the projections and they look reasonable. We've approved the budget as submitted.

The updated allocations will be reflected in next week's financial reports.

Best regards,
3M Finance Team
